example.name: missing arg1
example.text: Sales were well short of what they had hoped *trace*

roleset.note:
Most people seem to find this ungrammatical, or at least highly questionable. That doesn't mean it won't appear in WSJ.
Obviously they were hoping something about sales, like "they hoped sales would be *trace*", but that's just not available. In these circumstances leave an empty trace.
